com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.source.repository

Class GoBeesRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.source.repository.GoBeesRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GoBeesDataSource

    public class GoBeesRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements GoBeesDataSource
    Concrete implementation to load apiaries from the data sources into a cache. Here is where the synchronisation between different data sources must be done. In this version, there's just a local data source.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.davidmiguel.gobees.data.source.GoBeesDataSource

      • cacheIsDirty

        boolean cacheIsDirty
        Marks the cache as invalid, to force an update the next time data is requested. This variable has package local visibility so it can be accessed from tests.

                        java.util.List<Record> records,
                        @NonNull
                        GoBeesDataSource.SaveRecordingCallback callback)
        Description copied from interface: GoBeesDataSource
        Saves given list of records. Note: record must be a new unmanaged object (don't modify managed objects). The record id will be assigned (actual id will be ignored).
        Specified by:

        records - list of record unmanaged objects.
        callback - SaveRecordingCallback.
